name: Agent Reach
description: Self-contained agent discovery and communication over Nostr

privateKey.description: Nostr private key (nsec or 64-char hex). This is the agent's identity.

relays.description: Nostr relay URLs. Defaults to damus, nos.lol, nostr.band

allowFrom.description: Agent npubs or hex pubkeys allowed to send DMs. Empty = no inbound DMs.
